title: Story associated with a traditional holiday

content.question: Task 4: Cultural Presentation You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read the topic of your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Topic of presentation: Choose ONE Chinese story that is associated with a traditional holiday (such as the story of Chang'e, Qu Yuan, Chinese Valentine [Qi Xi], etc.). In your presentation, describe this story and explain its significance.
